block.title: Enter your Access Key and Secret Key
block.text: It is recommended that you create a new user that has read only access to Cloudwatch.

Before clicking Save be sure you have followed all setup instructions provided with the app.

A setup guide (SETUP.txt) is located in the app directory.

  1. Downloading/Extracting the Python Boto 2.1.1 module and creating a symbolic link in the app's bin directory
  2. Downloading/Extracting the Python Dateutil 1.5 module and creating a symbolic link in the app's bin directory
